400.description: The server could not understand the request due to invalid syntax

401.description: The request must authenticate itself to get the requested response

403.description: The server does not have access rights to the content

404.description: The server can not find the requested resource

408.description: The request took too long to complete

500.description: The server has encountered a situation it doesn't know how to handle

502.description: The server received an invalid response from the upstream server

503.description: The server is not ready to handle the request

504.description: The server did not receive a timely response from the upstream server

521.description: The origin web server refused connections

522.description: Server timed out, failed to contact the origin web server
